name: Run Code, Run!
tagline: Run any shell script in an atom tab.
body:
Well it's really easy: press Cmd+Ctrl+R and there ya go. Make sure to include a [shebang](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shebang_(Unix)) so your shell knows how to run the file.

See it in action: ![](http://i.imgur.com/f0tHAQW.gif)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
